questions.quote: Well, wait a minute, we're gonna tell each other everything, I mean every secret?
Those are my friends I was telling you about. We're gonna talk to them, pull over.
yeah... she says she doesn't wanna see me again. Told me to drop dead!
He does.  In fact we're looking for another girl if you know anyone.
How could she leave us alone with this lunatic? Ten more minutes, and that's it! I'm leaving. I have to tell you, this guy scares me.
She's on the lease! George you have got to find another place for me.
You shrunk it! You know you shrunk it! Just tell me that you shrunk it!
I know, you've been saying that for twenty years because you know you can't beat me. You couldn't beat me then and you can't beat me now.
Oh no, I'll tell you what you did Caligula; you combined food and sex in to one disgusting uncontrollable urge.
The circumcision was perfect. The finger was your fault! You flinched!
